name: Caudal Cove
description:
[Shelved Project: Caudal Cove]

Game state: 

Interactable Demo.

Genre: 

Dating, Exploration,

You find yourself washed ashore on an island. You have ten days until your pills run out. Can you survive? Stay sane?... Live a little? 

Maybe the new locals can help you? Or maybe you can learn something from the people of the past...

Controls: 

WASD= Move

Left Click/Right Click= Use Hand Item

E= Interact

I=Inventory

Left Shift= Sprint

ESC= Exit Fullscreen
